title: React Hooks
summary: I have documented some React hooks I find useful but there are many, many hooks out there. Here are some great React Hooks resources. Cheers!

body.raw:
There are many React hooks I find very useful and rather than documenting the ones I frequently use I thought it's easier (and better) to just provide some links here to some great collections and hooks I use frequently.

## React Hooks I often Use

- useBoolean
- useToggle
- useHasMounted
- useIntersectionObserver
- useHookForm

### References

- [useHooks](https://usehooks.com/)
- [React Hook Form](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-hook-form)
- [Rehooks](https://github.com/rehooks)
- [React Recipes](https://github.com/craig1123/react-recipes)
- [Awesome React Hooks](https://github.com/rehooks/awesome-react-hooks)
- [React Typescript Hooks](https://usehooks-ts.com/)
